Name: Brie Merritt
Project Description: These three canvases are made up of beer cans, beer bottle caps, and wine corks found around Oxford, Ohio in alleyways behind restaurants and bars and in front of fraternity houses. The two portraits represent Miami University’s student body and how drinking culture impacts how they are portrayed on the outside. In the third canvas, the Miami University logo is in the center, surrounded by cans to represent how alcohol impacts the campus community. I want my pieces to bring awareness to how drinking can affect peoples’ behavior and blind them to how their actions negatively affect Oxford’s environment.

Name: Luke Finley
Project Description: Love and Honor, On Paper is a protest to the hypocrisy behind Miami University and their slogan: "Love and Honor." This project discusses in detail the issues that Miami University has perpetuated regarding professor treatment: primarily of Adjunct and VAP professors.

Name: Tristin Bonnot
Project Description: Spreading stickers to raise awareness to Men's Mental Health

Name: Alex Manning
Project Description: Stickers created to bring awareness to the littering that occurs in Oxford, specifically regarding off-campus housing. These stickers reflect issues with cans not being properly disposed of and the confetti frequently used with graduation photos.

Name: Audrey Grimmett
Project Title: Subversion: Animal Testing in the Cosmetic Industry
Project Description: This is a subversion of an advertisement from Benefit Cosmetics remarking on their continuing use of animal testing for their products.

Name: Lauren Sawhook
Project Description: A subversive project focusing on going against body standards put on women in our society. I have created buttons to serve as a reminder that your body is not your enemy.

Name: Sara Hopple
Project Title: Trash Transformed: A Look Into Students Trash Waste
Project Description: An art piece that focuses on students off-campus problem of trash and littering. Subverting the minds of others to see how much students waste off-campus and what they can do to change this issue.
